#  [Pioneer Power Solutions](https://www.pioneerpowersolutions.com/)

Highly Engineered Electrical Equipment 

[Home](https://www.pioneerpowersolutions.com/) » [Investors](https://www.pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/) » SEC Filings

![](https://www.pioneerpowersolutions.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/CriticalPower-image-01.jpg)

[SEC Filings](https://pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/sec-filings/)

[Newsroom](https://pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/newsroom/)

[Presentations & Events](https://pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/presentations-events/)

[Corporate Governance](https://pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/corporate-governance/)

### SEC Filings

For the complete list of Pioneer’s SEC filings [click here](https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?company=Pioneer+Power+Solutions%2C+Inc.&owner=exclude&action=getcompany)

**Most Recent Annual and Quarterly Financial Reports**

11/14/24: 2024 Third Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/0001449792/000149315224045402/form10-q.htm)

10/17/24: Proxy Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224041410/formdef14a.htm) [2023 Annual Report](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224041497/formars.pdf)

10/08/24: 2024 Second Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224040481/form10-q.htm)

09/10/24: 2024 First Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224035661/form10-q.htm)

07/26/24: 2023 Annual Report on Form 10K [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224029269/form10-k.htm)

11/14/23: 2023 Third Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315223041076/form10q.htm)

09/21/23: Proxy Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315223033370/formdef14a.htm) [2022 Annual Report](https://www.pioneerpowersolutions.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Pioneer-2022-10-K-including-Wrap-Broadridge-Print-Ready-FINAL.pdf)

08/14/23: 2023 Second Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315223028464/form10-q.htm)

05/15/23: 2023 First Quarter Report Form 10Q [click here](https://www.sec.gov/ix?doc=/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315223017462/form10-q.htm)

**Registration Statements**

08/30/23: Form S-3 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315223030665/forms-3.htm)

04/29/22: Form S-8 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0001449792/000138713122005554/ppsi-s8_042922.htm)

10/20/20: Form S-3 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000138713120009091/ppsi-s3_101620.htm)

06/19/14: Form S-8 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000144979214000017/ppsi-20140619xs8.htm)

03/18/14: Form S-3 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000114420414016347/v371967_s3.htm)

08/01/13: Form S-1 Registration Statement [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000114420413042419/v351129_s-1.htm)

**Latest Proxy Statement**

10/17/24: Proxy Statement (DEF 14A) [click here](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1449792/000149315224041410/formdef14a.htm)

**SEC XBRL Filings**

XBRL (Extensible Business Reporting Language) is a language for the electronic communication of financial and business data. XBRL is one of many languages in the XML family for displaying information on the Internet. ZIP file collections of Pioneer’s XBRL financial statements are available [here](https://pioneerpowersolutions.com/investors/sec-filings/sec-xbrl-filings/)
